general.name: MSI Application Uninstaller
general.description:
Uninstalls applications using PowerShell. Just put in the name of the application you want to uninstall. Wildcards, i.e., "*Google*" are supported (do NOT use quotes in AEM).
NOT ALL APPLICATIONS ARE SUPPORTED, SEE MSI Application Uninstaller Lister to return a list of supported applications on a machine.

variable.name: name
variable.description: Type in the name of the application to uninstall, wildcards, e.g., *Google* are supported
